page.title: 14CLOWNE INFANTS SCHOOL
page.content: THIS IS A MODERN BUILDING OPENED IN SEPTEMBER 1976.THERE ARE 261 CHILDREN ON ROLL,9 TEACHERS,1 HEADTEACHER,2 WELFARE ASSISTANTS AND 2 ANCILLARY WORKERS WITH HANDICAPPED CHLIDREN. IT IS OPEN PLAN IN DESIGN AND IS BUILT ROUND THREE CENTRAL COURTYARDS.THERE ARE 3 GENERAL TEACHING AREAS EACH HAVING 3 TEACHING GROUPS.EACH AREA HAVING A CARPETED AREA,WHICH IS SHARED BETWEEN THE 3 TEACHING GROUPS. THERE IS A DINING,TEACHING AREA,AND A LIBRARY. THERE IS A ROOM FOR MUSIC. THE HALL IS USED FOR ASSEMBLY,P.E.,MUSIC,DANCE AND MOVEMENT THE COURTYARDS CAN BE USED FOR GARDENING AND THE CARE OF PETS. THERE IS A 60 PLACE NURSERY UNIT IN A PURPOSE BUILT NURSERY.THERE ARE 110 ON ROLL MOST ATTENDING FOR MORNINGS OR AFTERNOONS.
